languages.text: "Все, что благословлено взглядом Звездн{mf|ого|ой} Госпо{mf|дина|жи}, прослужит в два раза дольше! Клянусь Императором!"
"Anything blessed by the gaze of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} will last twice as long! I swear on the Emperor!"
languages.original_text: "Все, что благословлено взглядом Звездн{mf|ого|ой} Госпо{mf|дина|жи}, прослужит в два раза дольше! Клянусь Императором!"

traits.locale_text: "Anything blessed by the gaze of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} will last twice as long! I swear on the Emperor!"
"Anything blessed by the gaze of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} will last twice as long! I swear on the Emperor!"
"Anything blessed by the gaze of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} will last twice as long! I swear on the Emperor!"
"Anything blessed by the gaze of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} will last twice as long! I swear on the Emperor!"
"Anything blessed by the gaze of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} will last twice as long! I swear on the Emperor!"

languages.text: "Was vom Blick {mf|des himmlischen Herren|der himmlischen Herrin} gesegnet wurde, hält doppelt so lange! Das schwöre ich beim Imperator!"
languages.original_text: "Anything blessed by the gaze of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} will last twice as long! I swear on the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: "Was vom Blick {mf|des himmlischen Herren|der himmlischen Herrin} gesegnet wurde, hält doppelt so lange! Das schwöre ich beim Imperator!"

languages.text: « Toutes les denrées bénies par l'auguste regard de Sa Céleste Seigneurie durent deux fois plus longtemps ! L'Empereur m'en est témoin ! »
languages.original_text: "Anything blessed by the gaze of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} will last twice as long! I swear on the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: « Toutes les denrées bénies par l'auguste regard de Sa Céleste Seigneurie durent deux fois plus longtemps ! L'Empereur m'en est témoin ! »

languages.text: “所有被来自上界的大人目光祝福过的东西，都烂得特别慢！我以帝皇的名义发誓！”
languages.original_text: "Anything blessed by the gaze of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} will last twice as long! I swear on the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: “所有被来自上界的大人目光祝福过的东西，都烂得特别慢！我以帝皇的名义发誓！”

languages.text: «¡Todo lo que reciba la mirada bendita de{mf|l Señor| la Señora} Celestial durará el doble! ¡Lo juro por el Emperador!».
languages.original_text: "Anything blessed by the gaze of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} will last twice as long! I swear on the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Todo lo que reciba la mirada bendita de{mf|l Señor| la Señora} Celestial durará el doble! ¡Lo juro por el Emperador!».

languages.text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}のまなざしに祝福されたものは、どんなものでも二倍長持ちします！皇帝陛下に誓って！」
languages.original_text: "Anything blessed by the gaze of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} will last twice as long! I swear on the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}のまなざしに祝福されたものは、どんなものでも二倍長持ちします！皇帝陛下に誓って！」

languages.text: "Semavi {mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} bakışlarıyla kutsanan ürünler, iki kat daha uzun süre dayanır! İmparator şahidim olsun!"
languages.original_text: "Anything blessed by the gaze of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} will last twice as long! I swear on the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: "Semavi {mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} bakışlarıyla kutsanan ürünler iki kat daha uzun süre dayanır! İmparator şahidim olsun!"
